attributes.action: DUP to open polling station to allow the people of NI vote on same sex marriage.
attributes.background: The DUP keep blocking same sex marriage in Northern Ireland but what if people signed this petition to show that we want a polling station opened to give the public a voice.

rejection.details:
If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
